      • createOffer

        Offer createOffer(RuralHouse ruralHouse,
                  java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                  java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                  double price)
           throws BadDatesException
        Creates and stores in the database an Offer for the given RuralHouse that will start and end in the given dates, and will have the passed price.
        Parameters:
        ruralHouse - this offers associated rural house
        startDate - the offer start date
        endDate - the offer end date
        price - the cost per day of the offer
        Returns:
        the created Offer for the RuralHouse
        Throws:
        BadDatesException - thrown when the start date is greater than the end date
        See Also:
        Offer, RuralHouse

      • createOffer

        price - the cost per day of the offer
        Returns:

      • getOffers

        java.util.List<Offer> getOffers(RuralHouse ruralHouse,
                                java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                java.time.LocalDate endDate)
                         throws BadDatesException
        Obtains all offers of a given RuralHouse between the defined start and end dates range (both inclusive).
        Parameters:
        ruralHouse - the rural house to apply this search
        startDate - the start date
        endDate - the end date
        Returns:
        list of offers between both dates of the given rural house
        Throws:
        BadDatesException - thrown when the start date is greater than the end date
        See Also:
        Offer, RuralHouse

      • getOffers

        java.util.List<Offer> getOffers(RuralHouse ruralHouse,
                                java.util.Date startDate,
                                java.util.Date endDate)
                         throws BadDatesException
        Obtains all offers of a given RuralHouse between the defined start and end dates range (both inclusive).
        Parameters:

        startDate - the start date
        endDate - the end date
        Returns:

        BadDatesException - thrown when the start date is greater than the end date
        See Also:
        Offer, RuralHouse

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String password)
        Verifies that the login with the given user name and the password is correct and returns a boolean indicating if the login information is valid.
        This only verifies if the login should succeed, this does not make any further operations than the mentioned here.
        Parameters:
        username - the client user name
        password - the client password
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Client

      • getClient

        java.util.Optional<Client> getClient(java.lang.String username,
                                     java.lang.String password)
        Obtains a Client with the given user name and the password, if exists and is found.
        Parameters:
        username - the client user name
        password - the client password
        Returns:
        optional containing the found client or an Optional.Empty() if none was found
        See Also:
        Client, Optional

        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type
        U - the key type

        cls - the instance class
        key - the instance key
        Returns:
